title: Milk procurement rises 5.6% YoY in June, says minister Rupala
description: New Delhi: Milk procurement rose 5.6% year-on-year in June, Union minister for Animal Husbandry and Dairying Parshottam Rupala said the in Lok Sabha on Tuesday.
author: FE Bureau

title: PMI Electro appoints Aanchal Jain as CEO
description: Ms. Jain holds a Ph.D. in Economics from Northwestern University and an MSc. in Economics from The London School of Economics and Political Science (LSE), according to the statement.
author: Mukesh Jagota
